quote: Rule of life. If you bother to ask someone’s advice, then bother to listen to it.
author: Sophie Kinsella,  Confessions of a Shopaholic

quote: I always pass on good advice. It is the only thing to do with it. It is never of any use to oneself.
author: Oscar Wilde,  An Ideal Husband

quote: Do the best you can, and don't take life too serious.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Spend enough time around success and failure, and you learn a reverence for possibility.
author: Dale Dauten

quote: My only advice is to stay aware, listen carefully, and yell for help if you need it.
author: Judy Blume

quote: Never give advice unless you have walked the walk, because anybody can talk the talk.
author: Valencia Mackie

quote: Invest in yourself to get the best interest.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Live and act within the limit of your knowledge and keep expanding it to the limit of your life.
author: Ayn Rand,  Atlas Shrugged

quote: Before this generation lose the wisdom, one advice - read books.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: Have an intention, take action, and then learn on the way to success.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Above all else, guard your heart for it affects everything else you do.
author: Anonymous,  Holy Bible: New International Version

quote: Be control of your mind.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Be an example and open a new way for life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Friendship will not stand the strain of very much good advice for very long.
author: Robert Staughton Lynd

quote: Either plan your life or get ready to get lost.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Read books
author: Deliaha Hicks

quote: Stuff your brain with knowledge.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: Always do what you are afraid to do.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma - which is living with the results of other people's thinking. Don't let the noise of others' opinions drown out your own inner voice. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Be careful of success; it has a dark side.
author: Robert Redford

quote: Don't forget to love yourself.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: Read great books and be great.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: I owe my success to having listened respectfully to the very best advice, and then going away and doing the exact opposite.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Don't be afraid of failure. This is the way to succeed.
author: LeBron James,  Shooting Stars

quote: Before anything else, preparation is the key to success.
author: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: Be wiser than other people if you can; but do not tell them so.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Live well, Laugh often, Love much.
author: Bessie Anderson Stanley

quote: Don't set your goals by what other people deem important.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Prince and the Pauper

quote: Listen to what you know instead of what you fear.
author: Richard Bach

quote: Keenly seek knowledge.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Be in love with your life, every detail of it.
author: Jack Kerouac

quote: Be believing, be happy, don't get discouraged. Things will work out.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Get books, sit yourself down anywhere, and go to reading them yourself.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Do you have any advice for your readers?Lead the life that’s yours instead of faking someone else’s.
author: Sandy Nathan

quote: Ask yourself the secret of your success. Listen to your answer, and practice it.
author: Richard Bach

quote: Persistence. Perfection. Patience. Power. Prioritize your passion. It keeps you sane.
author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy

quote: Get it down. Take chances. It may be bad, but it's the only way you can do anything good.
author: William Faulkner

quote: My mother always said 'Don't bother other people.' I think that's good advice.
author: Amy Sedaris,  I Like You: Hospitality Under the Influence

quote: The most important decision you make is to be in a good mood.
author: Voltaire

quote: To find a focus, learn to love and dream.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Never be afraid to sit awhile and think.
author: Lorraine Hansberry

quote: Begin to acquire knowledge.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you've imagined.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do.
author: Benjamin Spock

quote: Procrastinate now, don't put it off.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: Honor your relationships by developing listening skills.
author: Allan Lokos,  Patience: The Art of Peaceful Living

quote: Learn the rules like a pro, so you can break them like an artist.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Step with care and great tact, and remember that Life's a Great Balancing Act.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Stay in love.
author: Debasish Mridha
